data.enText: the act of saying goodbye to sb
She said her farewells and left.

ex.chText: 她向朋友们道别后就离开了。
ex.enText: She said her farewells to her friends and left.

ex.chText: 他们赶来向那位深受尊敬的老教授的遗体告别。
ex.enText: They came to bid farewell to the body of the highly respected professor.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，含不易再见面之意。

ex.enText: You have to say goodbye to Susan.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，为离别时常用的告别语。

tr: an acknowledgment or expression of goodwill at parting

example.ex: They said their farewells there at the cafe.

trans: 欢送晚宴；散伙饭；告别晚餐；告别晚宴；告别晚会
再见亚特兰蒂斯；世界末日；再会亚特兰蒂斯
